definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
within the party (esp. Chinese communist party)

sentences.english: Keeping close contact with the masses is a good tradition of our Party.
sentences.chinese: 密切聯繫羣衆是我們黨的優良傳統。

sentences.english: The party was kept together by personal loyalty to the leader.
sentences.chinese: 這個黨是靠對領袖的個人忠誠而維繫在一起的。

sentences.english: I imagine that Party propaganda people will not pursue this line, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我不相信黨的宣傳人員會採信這一點。

sentences.english: He was always loyal to the Party.
Labour says…The process followed by National has been anti-democratic.
sentences.chinese: 工黨認爲，由國家黨主導的這個立法過程是反民主的。

sentences.english: The three leading cores have developed the unique theory of party building.
sentences.chinese: 黨的三代領導核心形成了各自獨創性的黨風建設理論。

sentences.english: It is the striking theme of the ruling history and country history that people are the masters.
sentences.chinese: 人民當家作主成爲黨的執政史和國史的鮮明主題。

sentences.english: The rain eventually returns during the party, and everyone except the women run for shelter.
sentences.chinese: 大雨期間，最終的回報黨，大家除了婦女跑警報。

sentences.english: There are many rays of innovation between lines in the Reprot of the Sixteenth Congress.
sentences.chinese: 黨的“十六大”報告字裏行間處處閃爍着創新的光芒。

sentences.english: The 16th National Party Congress put forward for strengthen the party's ability to govern.
sentences.chinese: 黨的十六屆四中全會提出加強黨的執政能力建設。

sentences.english: The 16th National Party Congress put forward for strengthen the party's ability to govern.
sentences.chinese: 黨的十六屆四中全會提出加強黨的執政能力建設。

sentences.english: The Party cannot live and develop if it isolates itself from the non-party masses.
sentences.chinese: 黨脫離了非黨羣衆就不能存在和發展。

sentences.english: He gave his all to the Party.
The G.O.P. used to be the party of business.
sentences.chinese: 過去，美國老大黨曾是一個支持商業發展的黨派。

sentences.english: The working class represents the CPC's strongest and most reliable class foundation.
sentences.chinese: 我國工人階級是我們黨最堅實最可靠的階級基礎。

sentences.english: Whether our lovable party did die in line of duty this professor locates the martyr?
sentences.chinese: 我們可愛的黨是否把這位因公殉職的教授定位烈士呢？

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
